name: Bitcoin BEP2
public_notice: Bitcoin-BEP2 is a Bitcoin 1:1 pegged token issued on the Binance Chain by Binance (https://www.binance.com/en/support/articles/360029288972)
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Bitcoin BEP2 (BTCB) is a token that is pegged to BTC at a rate of 1 BTCB = 1 BTC, issued on the Binance Chain by Binance. Binance backs each BTCB token with equivalent amount of BTC in a reserve which can be validated with in the following address BTC Reserve Address: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/3LYJfcfHPXYJreMsASk2jkn69LWEYKzexb BTCB Issuance Address: https://explorer.binance.org/asset/BTCB-1DE The objective of issuing BTCB is to bring Bitcoin liquidity to the Binance Chain so users are able to trade Binance Chain issued tokens against Bitcoin, especially on the Binance DEX.
